CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.PIOption AS PIOption, pi.Comment AS Comment, pi.ECMVersion AS ECMVersion, pi.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pi.Environment AS Environment, pi.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, pi.CANADataLink AS DataLinkA, pi.CANBDataLink AS DataLinkB, pi.J1708DataLink AS DataLinkJ1708, pi.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, pi.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pi.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pi.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PIOPTION AS pi WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.PIOption = pi.PIOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

History.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.PIOption AS PIOption, pi.Comment AS Comment, pi.ECMVersion AS ECMVersion, pi.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pi.Environment AS Environment, pi.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, pi.CANADataLink AS DataLinkA, pi.CANBDataLink AS DataLinkB, pi.J1708DataLink AS DataLinkJ1708, pi.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, pi.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pi.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pi.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PIOPTION AS pi, PIFR AS pifr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], pifr.FROption) > 0 AND ec.PIOption = pifr.PIOption AND ec.PIOption = pi.PIOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT pi.FROption AS FROption FROM PIFR AS pi, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE pi.PIOption = ec.PIOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY pi.FROption;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'IS2' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, 'N/A' AS CPL, pjfr.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjfr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND pjo.pjoption = ec.pjoption AND pjfr.pjoption = ec.pjoption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS CPL, pjfr.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjfr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.PJOption = pjo.PJOption AND ec.PJOption = pjfr.PJOption;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.PJOption AS PJOption, ch.History AS History FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'QSP' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, pjfr.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjfr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], pjfr.FROption) > 0 AND ec.PJOption = pjfr.PJOption AND ec.PJOption = pjo.PJOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT pj.FROption AS FROption FROM PJFR AS pj, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE pj.PJOption = ec.PJOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY pj.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.CertifiedModelName AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvertisedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPowerRpm AS GovernedSpeed, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS CentinelCPL, doo.Calibrationvoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PowerRating AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertLevel AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Throttletype AS ThrottleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec,SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.CertifiedModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvertisedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PowerRating AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertLevel AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4) = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPower + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPower + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT doo.RemoteThrottle AS RemoteThrottle, doo.TorqueCurveSelection AS TorqueCurveSelect, doo.ISCValidation, doo.MultUnitSync AS MultipleUnitSynchronization, doo.SwitchSPEEDInput AS SwitchedSpeedInput, doo.OutputdriverSetup AS OutputDriverSetup, doo.IdleValidation, doo.Throttletype AS ThrottleType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, apo.FuelType AS FuelType, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, TRANSTYPE tt WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND tt.TransType = doo.Transmission;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT doo.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartAid AS ECMControlledStartAid, doo.ElecFanClutchProv AS ECMControlledFanClutch, doo.Coolantlevelsensor AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ecSCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, IF(IsNULL(doo.Transmission) ," " ,(SELECT TransTypeDesc from TransType where doo.Transmission = TransType.TransType)) AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, TRANSTYPE AS tt, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, tt.TransTypeDesc AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, TRANSTYPE AS tt WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND tt.TransType = doo.Transmission AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, doo.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A to N/A in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, 'N/A to N/A in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, 'N/A to N/A lb/hr @ N/A rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, 'N/A to N/A lb/hr @ N/A rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, 'N/A' AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE WHERE ECMCODE.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledStartAid 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch 'N/A' AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, IF(IsNULL(doo.Transmission) ," " ,(SELECT TransTypeDesc from TransType where doo.Transmission = TransType.TransType)) AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS CentinelCPL, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, TRANSTYPE AS tt, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, tt.TransTypeDesc AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, TRANSTYPE AS tt WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND tt.TransType = doo.Transmission AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, doo.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A to N/A in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, 'N/A to N/A in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, 'N/A to N/A lb/hr @ N/A rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, 'N/A to N/A lb/hr @ N/A rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, 'N/A' AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE WHERE ECMCODE.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.CertifiedModelName AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvertisedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, ( sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' ) AS GovernedPower, ( sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRpm + ' rpm' ) AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName As OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Throttletype AS AxleType, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS CentinelCPL, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PowerRating AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption as FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertLevel AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType,

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.CertifiedModelName AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvertisedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PowerRating AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertLevel AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS DatalinkSupported FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (pp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRpm + ' rpm') AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, (pp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, (pp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, (pp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvertisedPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded') AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pp

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'AAM' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], pjfr.FROption) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY ec.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, pjo.CPL AS CPL, pjf.FROption AS FROption, pjo.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, PJO.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjf, ECMCode AS ec WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND pjo.PJOption = pjf.PJOption AND pjo.PJOption = ec.PJOption AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue];

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW pjo.CPL AS CPL, pjf.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjf, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND pjo.PJOption = ec.PJOption ;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW pjo.CPL AS CPL, pjf.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjf, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND pjo.PJOption = ec.PJOption ;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.PJOption AS PJOption, ch.History AS History FROM CHGHIST AS ch;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, pjfr.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjfr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], pjfr.FROption) > 0 AND ec.PJOption = pjfr.PJOption AND ec.PJOption = pjo.PJOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT pj.FROption AS FROption FROM PJFR AS pj, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE pj.PJOption = ec.PJOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY pj.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.CPL AS CPL, 'N/A' AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, 'N/A' AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS ThrottleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, 'N/A' AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, 'N/A' AS SCComments, 'N/A' AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, 'N/A' AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber=[ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

History.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.CPL AS CPL, ( 'N/A' + ' hp @ ' + 'N/A' + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, ( 'N/A' + ' hp @ ' + 'N/A' + ' bmp') AS AdvPowerBmpExpr, fro.Powerrating AS PowerRating, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Application, sco.Softwareversion AS SoftwarePhase, apo.Comment AS Comment, sco.Calrestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.FROption=fro.FROption AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], ec.FROption) > 0 AND ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL= ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY ec.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, pjo.CPL AS CPL, pjfr.FROption AS FROption, ec.PJOption AS PJOption, pjo.Environment AS Environment, pjo.EngineModel AS EngineModel, pjo.EmissionLevel AS EmissionLevel, pjo.NumberOfCylinders AS NumberOfCylinders, pjo.ModuleLocation AS ModuleLocation, pjo.CalRestr AS CalibrationRestriction, pjo.SoftwarePhase AS SoftwarePhase, pjo.Comment AS Comment FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PJOPTION AS pjo, PJFR AS pjfr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND pjo.pjoption = ec.pjoption AND pjfr.pjoption = ec.pjoption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT pj.FROption AS FROption FROM PJFR AS pj, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE pj.PJOption = ec.PJOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY pj.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, eio.EngModel AS EngineModel, (eio.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + eio.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS ISBAdvertisedPower, eio.ModularMining AS ModularMining, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.EIOption AS ElOption, eio.Comments AS ElComments FROM ECMCODE AS ec, EIOPTION AS eio WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND eio.EIOption = ec.EIOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS [ECM Code], ch.EIOption AS EIHistory, ch.FROption AS FRHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT eio.ModularMining FROM ECMCODE AS ec, EIOPTION AS eio WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND eio.EIOption = ec.EIOption;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.ApplRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase)=[eap].[ECMCodeBase]) AND ((ec.ECMCodeRev)=[eap].[ECMCodeRev]) AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ORDER BY (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev);

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' +sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ '+ sco.GovernedPowerRPM+ ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.AxleType AS AxleType, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Ppcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption As DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.Performancefeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS Datalink FROM PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption;

History.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCODE, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW doo.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartaid AS ECMControlledStartAid, doo.ElecFanClutchProv AS ECMControlledFanClutch, doo.Coolantlevelsensor AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' +ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.AxleType AS AxleType, doo.Performancefeature AS PerformanceOptions, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.Performancefeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS Datalink FROM PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, ppo.CentinelProvision AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT sco.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartAid AS ECMControlledStartAid, FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOption AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' +sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ '+ sco.GovernedPowerRPM+ ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.AxleType AS AxleType, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Ppcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption As DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType FROM SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.Performancefeature AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Communsupport AS Datalink FROM PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption;

History.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCODE, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW doo.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartaid AS ECMControlledStartAid, doo.ElecFanClutchProv AS ECMControlledFanClutch, doo.Coolantlevelsensor AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ppo.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType, doo.PerformanceFeature AS PerformanceOptions, doo.Calibrationvoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPcomments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, ec.FRoption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y');

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, tt.TransTypeDesc AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, TRANSTYPE AS tt, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND tt.TransType = doo.TransType AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, tt.TransTypeDesc AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, TRANSTYPE AS tt WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND tt.TransType = doo.TransType AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;
