CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.ApplRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType, doo.CalibrationVoltageX AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODE AS cc WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption = ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ThrottleType AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, sco.SCOption AS SCOption, doo.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, SSTRAIL AS ss WHERE ec1.SCOption = ss.OldOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ec2.SCOption = ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = ec2.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.ApplRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase)=[eap].[ECMCodeBase]) AND ((ec.ECMCodeRev)=[eap].[ECMCodeRev]) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ORDER BY (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev);

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch, 'N/A' AS TurboChargerType FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS AxleType, sco.PowerRating AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec,SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.PowerRating AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = RIGHT(ec.CPL,4) AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr));

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.RatedRPM+ ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT sco.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartAid AS ECMStartAid, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch, 'N/A' AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedSpeed + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedSpeed + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT DOOPTION.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, DOOPTION.ElecFanClutch AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE, DOOPTION WHERE ECMCODE.DOOption = DOOPTION.DOOption AND ECMCODE.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.SCOption AS SC, ec.DOOption AS DO, ppo.CPL AS CPL, sf1.FuelCode AS FuelCode, ppo.EngModel AS Model, (sf1.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sf1.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sf1.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sf1.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sf6.Datalink AS DataLink, sf1.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, sf1.HighIdle AS HighIdle, ppo.InjectorPN AS InjectorPartNumber, sf1.ApplRating AS Rating, ENGAPPL.EngApplication AS Application, sf1.Comments AS Comments FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SUBFILE1 AS sf1, SUBFILE6 AS sf6, CERTCODE AS cc WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND cc.Subfile1=ec.Subfile1 AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND sf1.Subfile1=ec.Subfile1 AND sf6.Subfile6=ec.Subfile6 AND ppo.PPOption=ec.PPOption AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1=0;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL, (sf1.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sf1.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sf1.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sf1.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ '+ sf1.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sf1.Comments AS Comments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOPtion AS DOOption, sf1.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, sf1.HighIdle AS HighIdle, sf6.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SUBFILE1 AS sf1, SUBFILE6 AS sf6 WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ppo.PPOption = ec.PPOption AND sf1.Subfile1 = ec.Subfile1 AND sf6.Subfile6 = ec.Subfile6;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sf1.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sf1.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sf1.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sf1.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, 'Rail Pressure ' + pfp.MinimumRailpressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaximumRailpressure + ' lb/hr @ ' + sf1.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS RailPressureAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SUBFILE1 AS sf1, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sf1.Subfile1 = ec.Subfile1 AND pfp.FuelCode=sf1.FuelCode;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '3944105' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE UNION SELECT TOP 1 '3944125' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE UNION SELECT TOP 1 '3990705' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.ApplRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedSpeed + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase)=[eap].[ECMCodeBase]) AND ((ec.ECMCodeRev)=[eap].[ECMCodeRev]) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType. 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedSpeed + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT doo.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMControlledStartAid AS ECMControlledStartAid, doo.ElecFanClutch AS ECMControlledFanClutch, 'N/A' AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

CalibrationSelectionForMarketingEntity.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW QueryName FROM MarketingEntityToCalibrationSelectionQuery WHERE MarketingEntityId IN ( select * from selectMarketingEntityId );

selectMarketingEntityId.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW MarketingEntityId FROM ECMPartNumberToMarketingEntity WHERE ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue];

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS ISBAdvertisedPower, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, 'N/A' AS VehicleModelYear, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, ppo.EngModel AS ModelName, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo,CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS ISBAdvertisedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.Calrestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PERFPARM AS pfp, SCOPTION as sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to N/A in hg @ ' + sc.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure +' to N/A in hg @ ' + sc.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to N/A lb/hr @ ' + sc.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate+ ' to N/A lb/hr @ ' + sc.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION as sc, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sc.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode = ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1=0;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

CalibrationSelectionForMarketingEntity.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW QueryName FROM MarketingEntityToCalibrationSelectionQuery WHERE MarketingEntityId IN ( select * from selectMarketingEntityId );

selectMarketingEntityId.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW MarketingEntityId FROM ECMPartNumberToMarketingEntity WHERE ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue];

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalRestr AS PerformanceOptions, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT doo.RemoteThrottle AS RemoteThrottle, ( doo.TorqueCurve1 + ' , ' + doo.TorqueCurve2) AS TorqueCurveSelect, doo.ISCValidation AS ISCValidation, doo.MultiUnitSync AS MultipleUnitSynchronization, doo.SwSpeedInput AS SwitchedSpeedInput, ods.OutputDriverDesc AS OutputDriverSetup, doo.IdleValidation AS IdleValidation, sco.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.CPL AS CentryCPL, (fqo.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + fqo.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fqo.EngModel AS Model, ec.FQOption AS FQOption ec.FuelCode AS FuelCode, fqo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Application AS Application, fqo.OEMName AS CentryOEMName, fqo.OEMModel AS CentryOEMModel, fqo.OEMApplication AS CentryOEMApplication, sf4.Comments AS Comments FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FQOPTION AS fqo, CERTCODE AS cc, SUBFILE4 AS sf4, ECMAP AS eap, PPOPTION AS ppo WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND eap.ECMCodeBase=ec.ECMCodeBase AND eap.ECMCodeRev=ec.ECMCodeRev AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND sf4.Subfile4 = ec.subfile4 AND ec.FQOption = fqo.FQOption AND ec.PPOPTION=ppo.PPOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT fqo.OEMName AS OEMName, fqo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, fqo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SUBFILE4 AS sf4, FQOPTION AS fqo WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND fqo.FQOption = ec.FQOption AND sf4.Subfile4 = ec.Subfile4;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW fqo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ppo.CPL AS CentryCPL, (fqo.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + fqo.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fqo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, pp.EngineAspiration AS EngineAspiration, sf4.Comments AS SCComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ccr.result AS CertificationCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FQOPTION AS fqo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, PPOPTION AS ppo WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND fqo.FQOption = ec.FQOption AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr=(ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) AND ec.PPOPTION=ppo.PPOption

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, SSTRAIL AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND cr.OldOption= ec1.FQOption AND ec2.FQOption = cr.NewOption AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.FQOption AND ec4.FQOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;
