PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.PowerRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, sco.Transmission AS TransmissionType, sco.Calrestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase)=[eap].[ECMCodeBase]) AND ((ec.ECMCodeRev)=[eap].[ECMCodeRev]) AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.PowerRating AS Market, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.Calrestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure+ ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure +' in hg @ '+ sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate +' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate +' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate+ ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PERFPARM AS pfp, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.FuelCode = pfp.FuelCode AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1=0;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1'AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS OEMName, 'N/A' AS OEMModel, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, 'N/A' AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, 'N/A' AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, 'N/A' AS SCComments, 'N/A' AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], ec.FROption) > 0 AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY ec.FROption;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'AAA' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '4086915' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE UNION SELECT TOP 1 '3682729' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE UNION SELECT TOP 1 '3683289' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.PowerRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, sco.Transmission AS TransmissionType, sco.Calrestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, SCOPTION AS sco, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase)=[eap].[ECMCodeBase]) AND ((ec.ECMCodeRev)=[eap].[ECMCodeRev]) AND cc.APOption=eap.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.PowerRating AS Market, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, sco.Calrestr AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure+ ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure +' in hg @ '+ sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate +' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate +' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate+ ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PERFPARM AS pfp, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.FuelCode = pfp.FuelCode AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1=0;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1'AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS OEMName, 'N/A' AS OEMModel, doo.Application AS ApplicationComments, 'N/A' AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, 'N/A' AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, 'N/A' AS SCComments, 'N/A' AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], ec.FROption) > 0 AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY ec.FROption;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'AAA' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMRawPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '3103533' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE UNION SELECT TOP 1 '3103522' AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fro.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (fro.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.CertificationCodes AS OEMName, doo.Application AS OEMModel, doo.CalRestriction AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, fro.ApplRating AS PerformanceOptions, fro.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.PowerRating AS DOComments, fro.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, pwo.FuelCode AS FuelCode, pwo.PWCurve AS PowerCurve, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, FROPTION AS fro, PPOPTION AS ppo, PWOPTION AS pwo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND doo.DOOption=ec.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND pwo.PWOption=ec.PWOption AND fro.FROption=pwo.FROption AND pwo.APOption = eap.APOption AND eap.APOption=cc.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev =ccr.ECMCodeExpr AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption ORDER BY (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev);

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT doo.CertificationCodes AS OEMName, doo.Application AS OEMModel, doo.CalRestriction AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fro.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (fro.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, fro.ApplRating AS PerformanceOptions, fro.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.PowerRating AS DOComments, pwo.FuelCode AS FuelCode, pwo.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, doo.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, fro.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, PWOPTION AS pwo, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND fro.FROption = [FROptionValue] AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL AND pwo.PWOption = ec.PWOption AND pwo.APOption = eap.APOption AND fro.FROption = pwo.FROption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, PERFPARM AS pfp, PWOPTION AS pwo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND fro.FROption = [FROptionValue] AND ec.APOption = pwo.APOption AND pwo.PWOption = ec.PWOption AND pwo.FROption = fro.FROption AND pfp.FuelCode=pwo.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT CalDate FROM CalDate;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fro.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (fro.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.CertificationCodes AS OEMName, doo.Application AS OEMModel, doo.CalRestriction AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType, fro.ApplRating AS PerformanceOptions, fro.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.PowerRating AS DOComments, fro.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, pwo.FuelCode AS FuelCode, pwo.PWCurve AS PowerCurve, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, FROPTION AS fro, PPOPTION AS ppo, PWOPTION AS pwo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND doo.DOOption=ec.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND pwo.PWOption=ec.PWOption AND fro.FROption=pwo.FROption AND pwo.APOption = eap.APOption AND eap.APOption=cc.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev =ccr.ECMCodeExpr AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption ORDER BY (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev);

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT doo.CertificationCodes AS OEMName, doo.Application AS OEMModel, doo.CalRestriction AS ApplicationComments, doo.Transmission AS TransmissionType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, fro.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (fro.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, fro.ApplRating AS PerformanceOptions, fro.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comments AS SCComments, doo.PowerRating AS DOComments, pwo.FuelCode AS FuelCode, pwo.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, doo.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, fro.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, PWOPTION AS pwo, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMCodeBase=eap.ECMCodeBase AND ec.ECMCodeRev=eap.ECMCodeRev AND fro.FROption = [FROptionValue] AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL AND pwo.PWOption = ec.PWOption AND pwo.APOption = eap.APOption AND fro.FROption = pwo.FROption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =ccr.ECMCodeExpr AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + fro.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + fro.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, PERFPARM AS pfp, PWOPTION AS pwo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND fro.FROption = [FROptionValue] AND ec.APOption = pwo.APOption AND pwo.PWOption = ec.PWOption AND pwo.FROption = fro.FROption AND pfp.FuelCode=pwo.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT CalDate FROM CalDate;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL as CPL, apo.FuelType AS FuelType, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS Catalyst, sco.ApplRating AS ApplicationComments, 'N/A' AS OxygenSensorPartNumber, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.APOption = apo.APOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT DOOPTION.AmbAirPressSens AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, DOOPTION.ElecFanClutch AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE, DOOPTION WHERE ECMCODE.DOOption = DOOPTION.DOOption AND ECMCODE.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) ;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT sco.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartAid AS ECMControlledStartAid, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch, 'N/A' As CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOption AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProvision AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, ppo.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc,APOPTION AS apo, SCOPTION AS sco, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) = (ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.Application AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.TechnicalModelName AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.RatedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.RatedRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.GovernedPowerRPM + ' rpm' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, ppo.CentinelProvision AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.Comments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comment AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, sco.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ((ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev) =(ccr.ECMCodeExpr)) AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND RIGHT(ec.CPL,4)=ppo.CPL;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT sco.AmbAirPressSensor AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, sco.ECMStartAid AS ECMControlledStartAid, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch, 'N/A' AS CoolantLevelSensorType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, 'N/A' AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMComments AS ApplicationComments, IIF(IsNULL(doo.Transmission) ," " ,(SELECT TransTypeDesc from TransType where doo.Transmission = TransType.TransType)) AS TransmissionType, doo.Axletype AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, ppo.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo, TRANSTYPE AS tt, SCOPTION AS sco WHERE ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND apo.APOPtion = ec.APOption AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedPower AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, ppo.CentinelProv AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.Comment AS SCComments, doo.Comments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, ppo.CertificationYear AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, 'N/A' AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND sco.SCOption = ec.SCOption AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ppo.CPL = ec.CPL;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, 'N/A' AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, 'N/A' AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS CentinelCPL, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, 'N/A' AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, 'N/A' AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, ENGAPPL AS ea, CERTCODE AS cc, ENGFAM AS ef, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.EngFamilyCode=ef.EngFamilycode AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, 'N/A' AS AxleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, 'N/A' AS GovernedPower, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, 'N/A' AS PerformanceOptions, 'N/A' AS Centinel, sco.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, apo.CertCodes AS CertificationCodes, 'N/A' AS CertificationYear, sco.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL = ppo.CPL AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ( ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev ) AS SoftwareCalibrationPhase, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT 'N/A' AS AmbientAirPressureSensor, 'N/A' AS ECMControlledFanClutch FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, SSTRAIL AS ss WHERE ec1.SCOption = ss.OldOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ec2.SCOption = ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = ec2.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.ContPower1500bhp + ' hp @ ' + fro.ContPower1500rpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (fro.ContPower1800bhp + ' hp @ ' + fro.ContPower1800rpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerBmpExpr, sco.ElectricalPowerRating AS PowerRating, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Application, sco.Softwareversion AS SoftwarePhase, apo.Comment AS Comment, sco.Calrestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.FROption=fro.FROption AND ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ec.CPL AS CPL, (fro.ContPower1500bhp + ' hp @ ' + fro.ContPower1500rpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, (fro.ContPower1800bhp + ' hp @ ' + fro.ContPower1800rpm + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerBmpExpr, sco.ElectricalPowerRating AS PowerRating, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Application, sco.Softwareversion AS SoftwarePhase, apo.Comment AS Comment, sco.Calrestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.FROption=fro.FROption AND ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, (ch.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ch.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT pfp.MinTorquePressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorquePressure + ' in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedPressure + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedPressure + ' in hg @ N/A rpm' AS IntakeManifoldPressureFullyLoaded, pfp.MinTorqueFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxTorqueFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ N/A rpm' AS FuelRateAtTorquePeakRPM, pfp.MinRatedFuelRate + ' to ' + pfp.MaxRatedFuelRate + ' lb/hr @ N/A rpm, Fully Loaded' AS FuelRateAtAdvertisedRPMFullyLoaded, pfp.MaximumBlowby AS MaximumBlowby FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PERFPARM AS pfp WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND pfp.FuelCode=ec.FuelCode;

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;

CompatibleEngineProgram.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'AAB' AS CompatibleEngineProgram FROM ECMCODE;

CompatibleCalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.CPL AS CPL, fro.Powerrating AS PowerRating, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.Application AS Application, sco.Softwareversion AS SoftwarePhase, apo.Comment AS Comment, sco.Calrestr AS CalibrationRestriction FROM ECMCODE AS ec, FROPTION AS fro, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, APOPTION AS apo WHERE ec.FROption=fro.FROption AND INSTR([CompatibleFROptionListValue], ec.FROption) > 0 AND ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL= ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND cc.APOption=ec.APOption AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

CompatibleFROption.SQL: SELECT ec.FROption AS FROption FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] ORDER BY ec.FROption;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec3.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND (ec.SupersessionFlag = 'Y' OR ec.SupersessionFlag = 'E');

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, STATICCALREDUCTION AS cr WHERE ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'E' AND cr.OldECMCodeBase = ec1.ECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMCodeBase = cr.NewECMCodeBase AND ec2.ECMPartNumber = ec1.ECMPartNumber UNION SELECT (ec3.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec3.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec4.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec4.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec3, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec4 WHERE ec3.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec3.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec3.SCOption AND ec4.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec4.ECMPartNumber=ec3.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

CalibrationSelection.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr, ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, sco.ApplRating AS Market, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, SCOPTION AS sco, PPOPTION AS ppo, CERTCODE AS cc, ECMAP AS eap, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption=sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption=doo.DOOption AND ec.CPL=ppo.CPL AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec.SupersessionFlag LIKE [SupersessionFlagValue] AND apo.APOption = ec.APOption AND INSTR([SelectedCertCodesValue], cc.CertCode) > 0 ORDER BY ec.ECMCodeBase, ec.ECMCodeRev;

ApplicationInformation.SQL: SELECT sco.ApplRating AS Market, doo.OEMName AS OEMName, doo.OEMModel AS OEMModel, doo.OEMApplication AS ApplicationComments, doo.TransmissionType AS TransmissionType, doo.ThrottleType AS ThrottleType FROM DOOPTION AS doo, ECMCODE AS ec WHERE doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue];

BaseEngineInformation.SQL: SELECT ppo.EngModel AS EngineModel, ec.CPL AS CPL, (sco.AdvPower + ' hp @ ' + sco.AdvPowerRPM + ' rpm') AS AdvPowerExpr, sco.GovernedSpeed AS GovernedSpeed, (sco.TorquePeak + ' lb-ft @ ' + sco.TorquePeakRPM + ' rpm') AS TorquePeakExpr, doo.CalibrationVoltage AS Voltage, ppo.PPComments AS CPLComments, sco.SCComments AS SCComments, doo.DOComments AS DOComments, ec.FROption AS FROption, ec.SCOption AS SCOption, ec.DOOption AS DOOption, ccr.result AS CertificationCodes, doo.HighIdle AS HighIdle, doo.Datalink AS Datalink FROM ECMCODE AS ec, PPOPTION AS ppo, SCOPTION AS sco, DOOPTION AS doo, CERTCODERESULT AS ccr WHERE ec.SCOption = sco.SCOption AND ec.DOOption = doo.DOOption AND ec.PPOption=ppo.PPOption AND ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ccr.ECMCodeExpr = (ec.ECMCodeBase+'.'+ec.ECMCodeRev);

History.SQL: SELECT ch.RevisionDate AS RevisionDate, ch.History AS CalibrationHistory, ch.SCOption AS SCHistory, ch.DOOption AS DOHistory FROM CHGHIST AS ch WHERE ch.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue];

SpecialParameters.SQL: SELECT doo.ElectronicFanClutch AS ECMControlledFanClutch, doo.RemoteThrottle AS RemoteThrottle, ( doo.TorqueCurve1 + ' , ' + doo.TorqueCurve2) AS TorqueCurveSelect, doo.ISCValidation AS ISCValidation, doo.MultUnitSync AS MultipleUnitSynchronization, doo.SwSpeedInput AS SwitchedSpeedInput, doo.OutputDriverSetup AS OutputDriverSetup, doo.IdleValidation AS IdleValidation, doo.ThrottleTypeDesc AS ThrottleType FROM ECMCODE AS ec, DOOPTION AS doo, ODSETUP AS ods WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND doo.DOOption = ec.DOOption AND ods.OutputDriverSetup = doo.OutputDriverSetup;

SupersededBy.SQL: SELECT (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, SSTRAIL AS ss, ECMCODE AS ec2 WHERE ec1.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec1.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ss.OldOption=ec1.SCOption AND ec2.SCOption=ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec2.ECMPartNumber=ec1.ECMPartNumber ORDER BY ec2.ECMCodeBase, ec2.ECMCodeRev;

IsSuperseded.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec.ECMCodeRev) AS ECMCodeExpr FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE ec.ECMCodeBase = [ECMCodeBaseValue] AND ec.ECMCodeRev = [ECMCodeRevValue] AND ec.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND SupersessionFlag = 'Y';

QueryVersion.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 '1' AS QueryVersion FROM ECMCODE;

SupersessionTrail.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW (ec1.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec1.ECMCodeRev) AS OldECMCode, (ec2.ECMCodeBase + '.' + ec2.ECMCodeRev) AS NewECMCode FROM ECMCODE AS ec1, ECMCODE AS ec2, SSTRAIL AS ss WHERE ec1.SCOption = ss.OldOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = [ECMPartNumberValue] AND ec1.SupersessionFlag LIKE 'Y' AND ec2.SCOption = ss.NewOption AND ec1.ECMPartNumber = ec2.ECMPartNumber;

ECMPartNumbers.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT ec.ECMPartNumber AS ECMPartNumbers FROM ECMCODE AS ec;

PropertyQueries.SQL: SELECT TOP 1 'History' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'PerformanceParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'SpecialParameters' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'BaseEngineInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE) UNION (SELECT TOP 1 'ApplicationInformation' AS QueryName FROM ECMCODE);

PerformanceParameters.SQL: SELECT '<Nothing>' AS IgnoreMe FROM ECMCODE AS ec WHERE 1 = 0;
